all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, mine house is a house of order, saith the Lord God, and not a house of confusion.
Doctrine and Covenants 132:8
Quote of the Day
"Our Heavenly Father desires all of His children to return to the celestial kingdom, where God and our Savior reside."
President Dallin H. Oaks | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
